h1.a: Bronx Charter School For Better Learning

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1850px; height: 890px;

div.div: As a result of recent COVID-19 regulations, the lottery process for BBL schools will now be held remotely on Thursday, April 23, 2020, at 4:00 pm via the Zoom platform. Scroll down to 'Upcoming Events' for Zoom links.

As a result of recent COVID-19 regulations, the lottery process for BBL schools will now be held remotely on Thursday, April 23, 2020, at 4:00 pm via the Zoom platform.
1. Click on this link: BBL 1 Zoom Meeting to join the meeting at BBL 1, *3740 Baychester Ave, Bronx 10466.
​ or
2. Click on this link: BBL 2 Zoom Meeting to join the meeting at BBL 2, *2545 Gunther Ave, Bronx, 10469.
PLEASE NOTE: BOTH MEETINGS BEGIN AT 4:00 P.M.

On April 16th, 2020, the Governor extended the Executive Order known as PAUSE, closing all schools until at least May 15th, 2020. He has stated that he will notify schools of further closure orders closer to that date.
If you have any questions, please contact BBL1 Principal Shubert Jacobs (sjacobs@bronxbetterlearning.org) or BBL2 Principal Anne Clarke-Raysor (araysor@bronxbetterlearning.org). ​
